entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight with 60 percent chance of showers before morning. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 100 over southern sections this evening. Wind becoming light late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: A few showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A few rain showers and periods of freezing rain ending late in the morning then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022
